content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace Array at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace (position 2.0, 2.0)

### Copper Plate Mine at position(-28.5, -61.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -28.5, -61.5)
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) (part of the Furnace Array)

### Iron Plate Mine at position(-15.5, -50.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -15.5, -50.5)
- Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0) (part of the Furnace Array)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to insufficient resources for crafting
- Check your inventory and ensure you have the required ingredients before attempting to craft items.
